content: Drywall reciprocating saw blades Heavy-duty reciprocating saw blade for drywall demolition – strong and smooth in metal, fast in boards ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specialized bimetal blades engineered to cut best in drywall Built to slice through screws and embedded metal parts as needed Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Cutting drywall Cutting plasterboard ### TECHNICAL DATA:Product Class: PremiumShank: 1/2 in universal shankTeeth per inch: 10 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 10 | Blade / disc thickness | 1.6 mm | Blade width | 0.87 in | Blade features | Long life, Heavy duty | Blade length | 6 in ### ITEMS- 2194396 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 10 (20) drywall - Package Size 20 pc
